Values.KAFKA_SSL_CA_LOCATION: <Path to .pem file. Required when running on AZ function app. Eg. C:\cacert\cacert.pem or %SYSTEMDRIVE%\cacert\cacert.pem>
Values.MARKET_DATA_QUEUE: Service bus queue name for market data messages
Values.TIMESERIES_QUEUE_CONNECTION_STRING: Endpoint=sb://<Service bus namespace fqdn>/;SharedAccessKeyName=<Name of shared access key>;SharedAccessKey=<Value of shared key>
Values.VALIDATION_REPORTS_QUEUE_TOPIC: <Name of topic for validation report messages>
